hero.title: Become an internationally recognized coach. Smarter, faster, more personal than ever.
hero.subtitle: Learn coaching with realistic AI avatars and real clients. Build your portfolio directly for EMCC certification – flexible, effective and affordable.

slimmer.title: Smarter learning
slimmer.description: AI that gets to know you and lets you grow

sneller.title: Faster growth
sneller.description: From start to certification at your pace

persoonlijk.title: Personally tailored
persoonlijk.description: The training adapts to you, not the other way around

toegankelijk.title: Proven quality
toegankelijk.description: Developed by psychologist with years of expertise as coach trainer

betaalbaar.title: Affordable path
betaalbaar.description: A fraction of the price of traditional training programs

results.title: What you achieve with this program
results.zekerheid: Confidence in your coaching conversations through dozens of hours of practice with avatars and clients.
results.portfolio: A complete portfolio that you can use directly for international certification.
results.vrijheid: Freedom to grow, your way — without waiting lists, travel time or group pressure.

lisa.name: Lisa, HR Manager
lisa.quote: I never thought practicing with AI would feel so real. It gave me the courage to work with real clients.

karim.name: Karim, independent coach
karim.quote: The portfolio I built during the training was exactly what I needed to apply for EMCC Practitioner.

sophie.name: Sophie, team coach
sophie.quote: The freedom to learn when I want, combined with real clients in the second phase, gave me a flying start as a coach.

authority.title: Built on experience and quality
authority.description: I am Alexander, psychologist and founder of De Academie voor Integrale Coaching en Therapie and the International Coach Academy. I wrote a management book about happiness and fourteen articles in professional journals about coaching and development of people and organizations. For decades I have been training professional coaches. As a psychologist, coach, supervisor and trainer, I have seen what works – and what doesn't.
authority.solution: Many coach training programs are expensive, inflexible and difficult to access. That's why I developed this program: a training that is personal, practice-oriented and achievable. So you can find your way to international certification faster, more flexibly and more affordably.
authority.experience: Developed from decades of experience in psychology and coaching

finalCta.title: Take the first step today towards your future as a coach
finalCta.description: This training gives you the skills, experience and portfolio to be recognized as a coach. But more importantly: you develop yourself into someone who actually makes an impact in the lives of others.

waitlist.title: Sign up for the waiting list
waitlist.description: Do you also want to become a professional coach quickly and easily? Sign up for the waitlist and be the first to be informed.
waitlist.name: Name
waitlist.consent: I give permission to receive updates by email. Terms and Conditions
waitlist.successBody: Thank you. We'll keep you updated.
waitlist.consentRequired: You must give permission to receive updates

hero.title: Learn coaching. Smarter, faster, more personal. Fully online, according to international standards.
hero.subtitle: The first fully AI-driven coach training that prepares you for international certification (EMCC). Train with realistic AI avatars, build your portfolio with real clients and grow into a certified professional.

intro.title: The fastest and most complete route to professional certification
intro.description1: You don't learn coaching from a book — you learn it by doing. That's why the Pro Coach Mastery Program combines the power of artificial intelligence with real practical experience. The program consists of the following modules:
intro.description2: In Professional Coach Training you train safely with realistic AI avatars, receive direct feedback and build the core skills of professional coaching. Then, in Professional Coach Certification Program you work with real clients, compile your portfolio and prepare for international certification at EMCC.

advantages.title: Why choose PCMP
advantages.onlineDesc: Study where and when you want.
advantages.avatarsDesc: Practice conversations that feel like real practice.
advantages.portfolioDesc: Everything you do counts towards certification.
advantages.alignedDesc: Learn according to the international standards of the profession.
advantages.phasesDesc: From basic competencies to professional mastery.
advantages.feedbackDesc: Know after each conversation exactly what you do well and where you grow.

pathway.title: A clear route to your certification

training.title: Professional Coach Training
training.description: First, you learn all the core skills of professional coaching in a safe digital environment. Thanks to realistic avatars, you practice conversations, receive direct feedback and develop your coaching competencies step by step.

certification.title: Professional Coach Certification Program
certification.description: Then you work with real clients, gain practical experience, supplement your portfolio with reflections and supervision, and prepare specifically for certification at the international professional association for coaches of your choice.

pathway.disclaimer: Note: we do not certify ourselves. After Pro Coach Mastery Program you can directly apply for EMCC certification at your desired level as a professional coach.

pillar1.title: Understanding Your Self
pillar1.goal: You know your values, beliefs and patterns, work out boundaries and role clarity and align your actions with the context and goals of client/sponsor.
pillar1.result: Stable professional presence, congruence and ethical sensitivity.

pillar2.title: Commitment to professional development
pillar2.goal: You continuously improve your craftsmanship through reflection, feedback, supervision and evidence-based work.
pillar2.result: Demonstrable growth in competencies and a sustainable learning and reflection rhythm.

pillar3.title: Contract management
pillar3.goal: You make expectations, goals, roles and boundaries explicit and maintain the contract throughout the coaching (incl. sponsor where relevant).
pillar3.result: Clarity and progress through well-contracted goals, evaluation moments and re-contracting.

pillar4.title: Relationship building
pillar4.goal: You build a safe, equal working relationship with attention to trust, power/dynamics and cultural sensitivity.
pillar4.result: Psychological safety and effective working alliance.

pillar5.title: Facilitating insight & learning
pillar5.goal: You elicit insight, perspective shifts and meaning-making that actually leads to learning.
pillar5.result: Noticeable increase in self-awareness and learning outcomes of sessions.

pillar6.title: Result- & action-oriented work
pillar6.goal: You translate insight into achievable goals, experiments and behavior change; you ensure transfer to practice.
pillar6.result: Concrete behavior, visible results and anchored change.

pillar7.title: Use of models & techniques
pillar7.goal: You choose and apply appropriate models, interventions and communication techniques aligned with goal and context.
pillar7.result: Goal-oriented, situationally appropriate interventions that accelerate learning.

pillar8.title: Evaluation
pillar8.goal: You measure effectiveness, monitor progress and build a culture of evaluation.
pillar8.result: Transparent outcome measurement, strong portfolio evidence and continuous improvement.

workflow.title: How becoming a professional coach with AI works in practice

step1.title: Step 1: Professional Coach Training
features: Two-pane viewer: left your assignments, right your conversation

step2.title: Step 2: Professional Coach Certification Program
features: Personal guidance and preparation for certification

certification.title: Prepared for international certification
certification.description:
After completing Professional Coach Training you master the core skills of coaching. After Professional Coach Certification Program you have a complete portfolio with everything needed for certification at EMCC.

Below you can see the prices. In addition, you have costs for self-organized supervision (approximately €200), certification at EMCC (approximately €200) and EMCC membership (€150 per year).
features: Complete portfolio according to international guidelines

anna.name: Anna, trainee coach
anna.quote: The avatars were so realistic that I forgot they weren't real clients.

david.name: David, career coach
david.quote: The portfolio from Professional Coach Certification Program was exactly what I needed to apply for EMCC Practitioner.

sophie.name: Sophie, team coach
sophie.quote: The combination of own pace in Professional Coach Training and real clients in Professional Coach Certification Program gave me a flying start.

requirements.label: Entry requirements
requirements.value: No specific prior education, but motivation and basic level English/Dutch

training.title: Professional Coach Training
training.description: All modules, AI avatars, feedback and automatic portfolio storage, so you master the core competencies of professional coaching.

certification.title: Professional Coach Certification Program
certification.description: Everything from Professional Coach Training, plus AI guidance in coaching real clients and portfolio building for certification at EMCC.

finalCta.title: Take the first step today towards your certification
finalCta.description: The first fully AI-driven coach training is ready for you. Start with Professional Coach Training and grow to Professional Coach Certification Program — your route to international recognition as a coach.

hero.title: Your desire to really help others further deserves a clear path
hero.subtitle: Whether you want to become a coach or deepen your existing experience: you're looking for a path that is achievable, recognized and meaningful. This training is there to give you that path.

recognition.title: Do you recognize this?
recognition.situation1: You feel you want to mean more in your conversations, but lack structure and skills.
recognition.situation2: You want to seriously work on coaching, but the high costs and waiting times of traditional training programs hold you back.
recognition.situation3: You're looking for a training that doesn't just offer theory, but really prepares you for practice and international certification.

desire.title: What you're actually looking for
desire.vakmanschap: Craftsmanship – conducting coaching conversations with confidence and competence.
desire.erkenning: Recognition – a training that prepares you for EMCC certification.
desire.weg: An achievable path – affordable, flexible and fitting your life now.

training.title: Realistic training
training.description: Realistic training: practicing with AI avatars that respond like real clients.

portfolio.title: Portfolio building
portfolio.description: Portfolio building: everything you need to apply for your certification.

practice.title: Step into practice
practice.description: Step into practice: guidance in coaching practice clients through your AI trainer.

founder.title: Why I do this
founder.description2: For decades I have worked as a psychologist, coach and mainly as a coach trainer – and therefore know what works, and what doesn't.
founder.description3: I wrote a management book about happiness and published fourteen articles in professional journals about coaching and development of people and organizations. Everything I've learned, I bundle in this program – so your development as a coach and as a person is lifted to the highest level.

results.title: What this gives you
results.zekerheid: Confidence in your conversations through dozens of hours of practice with avatars and clients.
results.portfolio: A complete portfolio that aligns with EMCC standards.
results.weg: An achievable, affordable and meaningful path to a future as a recognized coach.

finalCta.title: Your path to certification and craftsmanship starts here
finalCta.description: This training gives you everything you need to be recognized as a coach. But more importantly: you develop yourself into someone who actually makes an impact in the lives of others.

hero.title: Do you have questions? Feel free to contact us.
hero.subtitle: For example if you have a technical question, or want to know more about how certification at the international professional associations works.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.content:
TERMS AND CONDITIONS PRO COACH MASTERY (PCM)

Version 1.2 – December 30, 2025

Company: ICA Netherlands B.V.
KvK: 98840126
VAT-id: NL868665691B01
Address: Tasmanstraat 131, 2518VM Den Haag, Netherlands
Email: info@procoachmastery.com
Website/Platform: procoachmastery.com and/or the associated learning platform

These terms and conditions are drawn up for delivery to consumers (B2C). Mandatory consumer law always applies.

Article 1 – Definitions
In these terms and conditions, the following is understood:
PCM: ICA Netherlands B.V., operating under the name Pro Coach Mastery.
Participant/You: the natural person (18+) who takes the training for purposes outside his/her business or professional activity.
Agreement: the distance agreement between PCM and Participant regarding participation in the Training.
Training: the online coach training of PCM, delivered via the Platform and consisting of digital learning content (modules), AI functionalities (including AI avatar) and portfolio assessments, as described in the Offer.
Platform: the digital learning environment of PCM (or on behalf of PCM) in which the Training is offered.
Offer: the product page/checkout description that applied at the time of ordering.
Products: Pro Coach Mastery Training and Pro Coach Mastery Program (as described in the Offer).
AI functionality: (semi)automated functions that can generate feedback, role play, scoring, suggestions and/or (draft) assessments.
AI minute: a usage unit for AI functionality measured by PCM.
Certificate: the participation/completion certificate that PCM can issue based on the criteria in the Offer/Platform.
EMCC: European Mentoring and Coaching Council or a successor/affiliated organization that can offer (external) certification/recognition.

Article 2 – Applicability
These terms and conditions apply to every Offer and every Agreement between PCM and Participant.
Deviations only apply if PCM explicitly confirms these in writing.
If a provision is null or voidable, the remaining provisions remain in effect. PCM will replace the null/voided provision with a provision that comes as close as possible to the purpose within the limits of mandatory law.

Article 3 – Target group, age and territorial availability
The Training is exclusively intended for Participants aged 18 or older.
The Training is not offered to persons with residence/stay in Germany. If an order from or directed to Germany nevertheless comes about (e.g. due to incorrect data or circumvention), PCM may cancel the order and block access. In that case, PCM will refund the amount paid insofar as legally required.
PCM may (temporarily) restrict access in other countries if this is necessary to comply with laws and regulations or to prevent abuse, sanction risks or compliance risks.

Article 4 – Formation of the Agreement
The Agreement is formed as soon as Participant completes the order and payment is successfully processed (via Stripe or another payment provider designated by PCM), and PCM confirms the order or grants access.
PCM may refuse an order or request additional verification if there is a reasonable ground for this, for example in case of suspicion of fraud, abuse, unlawful conduct, chargeback risk or providing incorrect data.

Article 5 – Content of the Training and no result guarantee
PCM delivers an online coach training as described in the Offer.
PCM delivers a best-efforts commitment and gives no guarantee on specific results (such as revenue, client numbers, certification, admission or professional outcomes). Results also depend on effort, context and choices of Participant.
Participant understands that AI output is probabilistic and may be incorrect or incomplete. PCM does not guarantee that AI output is error-free.

Article 6 – Pro Coach Mastery Training and Program
PCM offers, among others, the following products (prices and exact content are in the Offer):
Pro Coach Mastery Training: modules, AI avatar conversations, AI feedback/scoring (within limits) and portfolio assessments.
Pro Coach Mastery Program: everything from the Training, plus AI guidance in coaching real clients and guidance in portfolio building (including towards EMCC trajectory), as further described in the Offer.
Supervision/mentor coaching is not included. If supervision or mentor coaching is required for an external trajectory (such as EMCC), Participant organizes this themselves.

Article 7 – Access and duration
After payment, Participant will in principle receive immediate access to the Platform.
Participant receives access to the Platform and the essential components of the Training for a minimum of 3 years from the date of first access.
PCM may terminate access after 5 years. After 5 years, the right to access expires, unless PCM explicitly extends.
Access depends on operation of the Platform by PCM. If PCM discontinues operation within the minimum access period of 3 years and cannot offer a reasonable alternative, PCM will provide an appropriate solution insofar as legally required (e.g. proportional refund for the remaining part of the minimum access period).

Article 8 – Support (human) and communication
Human support is included with both Training and Program, as described in the Offer.
Support is provided via info@procoachmastery.com and/or via the Platform. PCM strives to respond within 2 business days. This is a best-efforts obligation, not a guarantee.
Support is intended for questions about access, use and general training questions. Support is not medical, psychological, legal or financial advice.

Article 9 – Fair use and AI usage limits (hard stop)
To maintain quality, stability and costs, PCM applies a fair-use policy.
Per Participant, the following applies (total over the access period), unless stated otherwise in the Offer:
AI avatar: maximum 2,500 minutes total.
AI total: maximum 5,000 minutes total (including AI avatar).
Upon reaching the limit, the relevant AI functionality automatically stops (hard stop). Participant retains access to the other components of the Training within the access period.
PCM determines the measurement method and records usage in logs.

Article 10 – Usage rules, prohibited behavior and enforcement
Participant uses the Training lawfully and carefully and refrains from behavior that may harm PCM, other persons or third parties.
It is prohibited (non-exhaustive):
to share, lend, resell or make available to third parties account/access;
to copy, distribute, publish, republish or resell learning materials, prompts, videos, audio, templates or AI output;
screen recording, recording or stream ripping of (parts of) the Platform, lessons or AI sessions;
scraping, reverse engineering, security testing without permission, or circumventing limits/technical measures;
intimidation, discrimination, doxxing, hate speech, threats or otherwise unlawful conduct;
payment fraud or initiating an evidently incorrect chargeback.
In case of (suspected) violation, PCM may take measures, including warning, suspension, restriction or termination of access.

Article 11 – Use with real clients and data of third parties
If Participant applies the Training in coaching with real clients, Participant is themselves responsible for the coaching relationship, the content of the coaching and compliance with applicable laws and regulations (including privacy rules).
Participant does not enter personal data of clients or other third parties into the AI functionality, unless Participant is demonstrably entitled to do so and this fits within the privacy statement and applicable law. PCM recommends always anonymizing.
PCM is not liable for damage that arises from the use of the Training or AI output in practice by Participant.

Article 12 – Certificate, assessment and human reassessment
Participant can receive a certificate if the criteria from the Offer/Platform have been met.
Assessments and the certificate decision can (largely) take place automatically.
Participant can request a human reassessment of the certificate outcome within 14 days after the result. PCM may ask for a brief and concrete substantiation.
PCM strives to complete a reassessment within 30 days.

Article 13 – External certification and EMCC (no guarantee, no liability)
External certification/recognition (such as EMCC) is not part of the Agreement with PCM, unless explicitly agreed otherwise in writing.
PCM does not guarantee that the Training (now or in the future) meets EMCC requirements or that EMCC accepts an application.
Changes in policy, criteria, interpretation, procedures, rates or recognition possibilities at EMCC (including a possible requirement that training must be provided by humans) do not constitute a shortcoming of PCM and do not give rise to compensation, price reduction or restitution, except for mandatory law.
Participant is themselves responsible for verifying current EMCC requirements and organizing any supervision/mentor coaching.

Article 14 – Prices, VAT/CRKBO and invoicing (secure)
The price of the chosen product is in the Offer and in the checkout.
PCM is CRKBO-registered. PCM aims to apply the VAT education exemption where applicable. The VAT treatment may depend on (i) the nature of the service, (ii) the country of Participant and (iii) applicable rules. The checkout/invoice is leading.
If a tax authority or legislation gives rise to a different tax treatment, PCM can adjust this for future sales. For already concluded Agreements, legal consumer rights remain intact.

Article 15 – Payment, chargebacks and collection
Payment is processed via Stripe or a payment provider designated by PCM.
If Participant initiates a chargeback/dispute, PCM may (temporarily) suspend access during the investigation.
If a chargeback proves incorrect or is decided in favor of PCM by the payment provider, PCM may charge reasonable administrative costs and demonstrable external costs (such as dispute fees), insofar as legally permitted.

Article 16 – Right of withdrawal (14 days) and refund policy
Participant has as a consumer the legal right of withdrawal of 14 days for a distance agreement.
Withdrawal can be made within 14 days after concluding the Agreement by an unambiguous statement by email to info@procoachmastery.com. PCM confirms receipt.
After withdrawal, PCM terminates access and Participant must stop all use of the Platform and Content. Any downloads or copies of Content may not be (further) used or distributed.
PCM refunds according to legal rules and terms. If and insofar as the law permits, PCM may charge a proportional fee for services already provided if Participant has explicitly requested immediate execution.
After the withdrawal period has expired, refund is not possible, except when mandatory law requires this (for example in case of non-conformity or other legal remedies).

Article 17 – Cancellation/rescheduling of planned contact education (only if offered)
This article only applies if PCM offers planned contact education (human sessions) and Participant books a time slot for this (whether or not as an add-on).
Cancellation policy by Participant:
more than 6 weeks before start: free of charge;
6 to 4 weeks before start: 50% of the value of the time slot;
4 to 2 weeks before start: 75% of the value of the time slot;
less than 2 weeks before start or no-show: 100% of the value of the time slot.
Rescheduling within 48 hours before start may be refused or considered as used.

Article 18 – Intellectual property
All intellectual property rights on the Platform and Content rest with PCM or its licensors.
Participant receives a limited, personal, non-transferable right of use for own learning purposes during the access period.
Violation (such as screen recording, copying/distributing or reselling) qualifies as a serious shortcoming. PCM may then immediately terminate access and recover damage and costs, insofar as legally permitted.

Article 19 – Privacy, retention periods and evidence
PCM processes personal data in accordance with the privacy statement and GDPR.
PCM may process, among others: account data, payment status, progress, scores, (parts of) transcript/AI interactions, feedback summaries and technical logs.
Retention period: PCM retains relevant data in principle for a minimum of 3 years and a maximum of 5 years after the end of the Agreement, unless a longer retention obligation applies or longer retention is necessary for disputes/claims.
Electronic communication and logs from PCM can serve as evidence, subject to counter-evidence.

Article 20 – Liability
PCM is not liable for indirect damage, consequential damage, lost profit or reputational damage, insofar as legally permitted.
Insofar as PCM is liable, liability is limited to the amount paid by Participant for the relevant product, unless mandatory law provides otherwise.
Nothing in these terms and conditions excludes liability that cannot be excluded under mandatory law (such as liability in case of intent or conscious recklessness).

Article 21 – Force majeure and third parties
PCM is not obliged to perform if there is force majeure, including (non-exhaustive) disruptions at hosting/LLM providers, network disruptions, cyber incidents, failure of payment providers or government measures.
PCM may engage third parties for (parts of) the Training. PCM is not liable for decisions or policy changes of third parties, including external certification bodies.

Article 22 – Termination and suspension
PCM may suspend or terminate access in case of (suspected) fraud, abuse, violation of these terms and conditions or unlawful conduct.
Upon termination, access and usage rights expire immediately. Insofar as legally permitted, there is no right to restitution upon termination due to attributable shortcoming or unlawful conduct by Participant.

Article 23 – Applicable law and competent court
Dutch law applies to the Agreement.
Disputes are submitted to the competent court in The Hague, insofar as a forum choice towards consumers is permissible. Participant retains legal rights to also submit a dispute to the competent court in their own country of residence if mandatory law so provides.

Appendix 1 – Model form for withdrawal
Only fill in and return this form if you wish to withdraw from the agreement.
To: ICA Netherlands B.V., Tasmanstraat 131, 2518VM Den Haag, Netherlands, info@procoachmastery.com
I/We* hereby notify* that I/we* withdraw/withdraw* our agreement regarding the Training.
Ordered on*/received on*:
Name of consumer(s):
Address of consumer(s):
Signature of consumer(s) (only if this form is submitted on paper):
Date:
* Cross out what does not apply.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
PRIVACY POLICY PRO COACH MASTERY (PCM)

Version 1.0 – December 30, 2025

Company: ICA Netherlands B.V.
KvK: 98840126
VAT-id: NL868665691B01
Address: Tasmanstraat 131, 2518VM Den Haag, Netherlands
Email: info@procoachmastery.com
Website/Platform: procoachmastery.com and/or the associated learning platform

This privacy policy describes how Pro Coach Mastery (PCM) collects, uses and protects personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

1. Data Controller
ICA Netherlands B.V., operating under the name Pro Coach Mastery, is the data controller for the processing of personal data.

2. What personal data do we collect?
We collect and process the following categories of personal data:

2.1 Data you provide to us:
Name and email address (via contact form and waitlist form)
Messages you send via the contact form
Account data (when registering for the training)
Payment data (via Stripe)
Consent for marketing communications

2.2 Data collected automatically:
Technical logs (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Usage data (page views, click behavior)
Progress and scores within the learning platform
(Parts of) transcript/AI interactions
Feedback summaries

2.3 Anonymized data about clients:
If you as a participant apply the training with real clients, anonymized data about coaching conversations may be stored in the platform for learning purposes.

3. Purpose and legal basis for processing
We process your personal data for the following purposes:

3.1 Performance of contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR):
Delivering the online coach training
Account management and access to the platform
Processing payments
Education, assessment and certification
Support and communication

3.2 Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR):
Marketing communications by email (if you have given consent for this)
Newsletters and updates

3.3 Legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR):
Retention of data for tax and administrative purposes
Compliance with applicable laws and regulations

3.4 Legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR):
Improving our services and platform
Security and fraud prevention
Analytics and statistics (with anonymized data where possible)

4. Who do we share your data with?
We share your personal data with the following parties:

4.1 Service providers:
Supabase (EU): Database and data storage
Vercel (EU): Website hosting
Hostinger (EU): Hosting and infrastructure
Stripe (EU): Payment processing
OpenAI (EU): AI functionalities and processing of interactions
Brevo: Email marketing and newsletters
Google Analytics: Website analytics and statistics

4.2 Data processing:
All these parties process data as processors on behalf of PCM and are contractually obligated to protect your data and only use it for the purposes for which they are engaged.

4.3 Legal obligations:
We may share your data if this is legally required or upon request from competent authorities.

5. International transfers
Your personal data is processed and stored within the European Union (EU). All service providers we use process data within the EU or have implemented appropriate safeguards in accordance with the GDPR.

6. Retention periods
We do not retain your personal data longer than necessary:

Account and training data: Minimum 3 years and maximum 5 years after termination of the agreement
Payment data: In accordance with legal retention obligations (usually 7 years)
Marketing consent: Until you withdraw your consent
Technical logs: Maximum 2 years
Analytics data: Maximum 26 months (Google Analytics default)

Longer retention may be necessary for disputes, claims or legal obligations.

7. Cookies and tracking
We use cookies and similar technologies for:

7.1 Functional cookies:
Login functionality
Platform functionality

7.2 Analytical cookies:
Google Analytics: For analyzing website usage and improving our services
Tracking pixels for analytics

You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Note: disabling cookies may limit the functionality of the platform.

8. Data security
We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Access restrictions and password protection for the login portal
Regular security audits
Limited access to personal data (only for employees who need it)

9. Your rights
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

9.1 Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR):
You can request which data we process about you.

9.2 Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR):
You can have incorrect data corrected.

9.3 Right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR):
You can request deletion of your data, unless we must retain it for legal purposes.

9.4 Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR):
You can request restriction of the processing of your data.

9.5 Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR):
You can receive your data in a structured format.

9.6 Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR):
You can object to processing based on legitimate interest.

9.7 Right to withdraw consent:
You can withdraw your consent for marketing communications at any time via the unsubscribe link in emails or by contacting us.

10. Exercising your rights
To exercise your rights, you can contact us via:
Email: info@procoachmastery.com
Post: ICA Netherlands B.V., Tasmanstraat 131, 2518VM Den Haag, Netherlands

We respond within 1 month to your request. In complex cases, this may be extended by a maximum of 2 months.

11. Right to lodge a complaint
If you believe that we do not process your personal data correctly, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the Dutch Data Protection Authority (Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens):

Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens
P.O. Box 93374
2509 AJ Den Haag
The Netherlands
Phone: +31 88 - 1805 250
Website: www.autoriteitpersoonsgegevens.nl

12. Automated decision-making
Within the platform, assessments and evaluations can (largely) take place automatically. You have the right to request a human reassessment within 14 days after the result (as described in the Terms and Conditions, Article 12).

13. Changes to this privacy policy
We may adjust this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be published on this page with indication of the date of the last change. In case of significant changes, we will inform you by email.

14. Contact
For questions about this privacy policy or the processing of your personal data, you can contact us:

ICA Netherlands B.V.
Tasmanstraat 131
2518VM Den Haag
Netherlands
Email: info@procoachmastery.com

Last updated: December 30, 2025
